辣鸡游戏，司马暴雪

从有STEAM 就没写过测评 甚至怎么写都是上网查的 重新下载了加速器 把他添加进去  然后 看见熟悉的 界面就是为了给差评 16年的夏天 我买了豪华版的守望先锋和朋友们玩的 特别欢乐 六个毛妹 六个大锤的套路 后来快速游戏变成不能选重复英雄了 我们还是一起玩的很开心  出街机模式  然后慢慢地 限制职业 我们就去自定义模式跑酷 暴雪你还记得游戏是什么吗 他只不过是个娱乐的东西 你限制这个限制那个 然后美其名曰出个守望先锋2 坦克限制就得是坦克 输出量必须降低 以前开箱子的皮肤 也得花钱了 对于你们来说就是个商业游戏 我还是喜欢以前的守望先锋 16年的守望先锋  而不是现在当只会为了钱 和你所谓的电竞联赛梦 做的这一坨 现在的守望先锋早就不是当年的那个守望先锋了 只不过是披着老皮的新游戏 暴雪也不是当年的暴雪了 而是为了钱什么都干得出来的 渣滓 毕竟现在的暴雪 只是需要快钱 真心开发游戏的人 比不过你们这群垃圾

One of the worst battlepasses and monetization model in gaming right now. Skins which used to be free are now $20. A skin in a bundle as we speak is a pay to earn. Meaning you buy the bundle, but you still have to earn the skin. You’re buying the ability to obtain the skin. That’s nuts.

For my actual review of the game on Steam, I’ve crashed 4 times. Funnily enough, I’ve only played 4 games. The PvE is meh. You don’t get the bundle if you buy it on Steam since it’s bugged.

So… yeah. Buggy, not consumer friendly, the PvE is very mediocre. The PvP is okay and worth checking out. It’s not balanced well so they’re constantly making changes to characters or even straight up changing the entire kit of characters. 

I give it a 4/10.

They "removed" Overwatch 1 to re-release the game as a free to play business model, which leans heavily into microtransactions, such as overpriced skins, and overpriced bundles filled with stuff no one wants in the first place. The problem with this isn't the model even if it's predatory, It is that they taken playable content such as Heroes and locked them behind either hours of grind or 10$ to buy the battlepass.

To make matters even worse they took the PvE hero content that was supposed to be a complete game. That would drop with hero specific missions, a full campaign, and talent trees with "infinite" replayability. that was canceled and instead the PvE cost 15$ for a light story pack of 3 missions that plays something similar to the archive free events from the "first game".

A game riding on its old glory days. 

Blizzard does not care for their playerbase, only their wallets. 

Don't support a game and a company which:

- Creates a money hungry and negative working environment for their devs and other employees.
- Doesn't listen to frequent player feedback, only the underinformed casual player's wallet. 
- Re-Releases games with minimal improvements (if at all or even in a worse state) with AAA-game prices. 
- Makes promises it can't keep for financial gain.
- Kills its esports scenes on purpose.

I paid for a DLC pack on steam and didn't get it ingame, I GOT SCAMMED do not recommend spending money on this game. Also I've spent over 2000 hours easily playing this game and have been high grandmaster since overwatch 2's release, this game is good, but the devs and company are ruining it every season.
